Description:
Reba is a great little pup with a heart condition where one of the chambers of her heart is split into two. Because of this we are looking for a very special home for her where she can live a calm and peaceful life.  She loves to snuggle and is very affectionate but also has a bit of independence to her and she is perfectly fine in her own space. She is growing to love her crate and now sleeps in it much of the day. On her short walks and in the apartment, she is curious and likes to cautiously explore her surroundings. She often makes several new human friends when we go outside. She has been extremely low maintenance, has not had a single accident and she immediately goes to the bathroom once outside.

Reba is 2 years old and looks like a Beagle Shepherd mix. She is fully grown at 29lbs, and she is up to date on all age appropriate medical care and microchipped.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is fill out an adoption application at www.muddypawsrescue.org. We will be in touch with you within 7 days of receiving your application!
Name: Reba

Description:
Foster update: "Hi, my name is Barney! I am a German Shepherd mix who enjoys a nice walk and then hanging out at home. I don't mind taking a nap on the floor instead of being in the bed. I love pets on the head and asking for more. I am really sweet and rarely bark. I get excited when other dogs approach me. If you're looking for a sweet companion, I am your guy!" Barney is sweet, calm, and easygoing. He is house-trained and great in his crate. Apply to adopt Barney today!

Barney is 8 years old and looks like a shepherd mix. He is 49 lbs fully grown, and is up to date on all age-appropriate medical care and microchipped.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is fill out an adoption application at www.muddypawsrescue.org. We will be in touch with you within 7 days of receiving your application!
Name: Barney

Description:
Foster Update: "Meet Bianca, an absolute unit of aww! Found as a stray and brought to the Brooklyn ACC scared, matted, and filthy, this 10-year old spaniel/collie mix is now in foster care working on losing the Quarantine 15 (#relatable) and could not be more chill. Bianca is an Olympic napper, with gold medals in binge-watching and low-key neighborhood walks. She's quite happy to meet new people, and will graciously allow everyone to pet her-especially essential workers carrying bags she can inspect for crumbs. She is completely unbothered by street noise, neighbor noise, and TV noise, loves belly rubs, ear scritches, car rides and, most of all, cream cheese. Her favorite spot in the house is on the floor, next to you-especially if you're in the kitchen. If you have furniture you want to protect, fret not- Bianca is content to be your canine footrest. She is more than full-grown at 59 lbs but once her diet and low impact exercise routine kicks in, we expect her to be a sturdy 42-45 lbs. If sweet, lazy, undemanding and quiet is your speed, our living stuffed animal Bianca may be just the dog for you.

Blanca is 10 years old and looks like a medium mixed breed. She is an overweight 59 lbs, and is up to date on all age-appropriate medical care and microchipped.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is fill out an adoption application at www.muddypawsrescue.org. We will be in touch with you within 7 days of receiving your application!
Name: Blanca

Description:
Hi! I'm Rambo! I'm a big, fluffy, loving pup. I've got velvety soft ears that I'd be very happy for you to pet all day long as I lay my big puppy head in your lap. I'm adjusting well to life in the
suburbs of NYC, and I love my foster parents' back yard. My ideal forever home would be in the suburbs, since some of the noises here still startle me, but every day I'm getting more used to the new sounds. I'm learning to walk with a loose leash and my foster mom has taught me how to sit and lie down. After we take our walks and practice our new tricks, I'm more than
happy to take a looong nap or chew on a bone while chilling in the AC. I can't wait to find my forever home where I can continue to learn new tricks and doll out endless puppy kisses
and snuggles.

Rambo is 2 years old and looks like a great pyrenees and golden retriever mix. He is fully grown at 58lbs, and he is up to date on all age appropriate medical care and microchipped.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is fill out an adoption application at www.muddypawsrescue.org. We will be in touch with you within 7 days of receiving your application!
Name: Rambo

Description:
Juno is approximately 1.5 years old and weighs about 60 pounds, although he certainly doesn't realize it and considers himself a true lap dog! Juno is going to make the absolute best companion for his human - he is loving, loyal, eager to learn, and very curious. He hasn't had the most stable start in life, but he did come to Muddy Paws knowing a few commands and was clearly well-cared for physically.

Juno is housebroken, although he had a handful of accidents while getting settled. With a regular schedule and crate training, he's doing wonderfully and definitely knows where the "bathroom is! He settles quickly in his crate, although he loves being near his human and has those puppy dog eyes DOWN :). 

Juno is a very well-intentioned dog, but at 60 pounds is very powerful, and we would not recommend he go to a home with small children only because he might accidentally knock them over! With structure, consistency, and time, we are fully confident that Juno would eventually be a wonderful sibling to smaller humans.

The hustle and bustle of the city is a little overwhelming to Juno right now, but when he is inside or in his foster's backyard, he is excited, goofy, loves running around, and has about as much energy as you'd expect from a one year old! He knows sit, paw/other paw, and lay down, and is working hard at learning not to pull on a leash. 

Juno's foster mom has been gradually introducing him to the resident dogs, and we have only seen encouraging behavior (sometimes disinterest, sometimes appropriate levels of curiosity). We feel that Juno will do well with dogs and have seen nothing to indicate otherwise, but we always take dog-dog intros slowly just as a precaution! 

Juno will be a wonderful companion pup, and he can't wait to meet the family that will help him continue to put the time, effort, and training in to get him there!

Juno is 1.5 years old and looks like a pit mix. He is 61 lbs fully grown, and is up to date on all age-appropriate medical care and microchipped.
Name: Juno

Description:
Foster update: Get ready to grab a cold one with your new broski, Rootbeer! This tri-color boy is as chill as they come. Rootbeer can often be found napping with his head under the couch, TV stand, your arm...he likes to burrow! But like any good napper, Rootbeer knows how to make the most out of play time (play hard, nap harder). He loves to wrestle with his brother Popcorn and undo knots in his rope toys. Though Rootbeer is slightly bigger, he tends to follow his brother's lead. Rootbeer hasn't quite learned his table manners yet - he is a speed eater and will steal bites from his brother's bowl if not supervised. Rootbeer and his brother are really good at getting their zoomies out before bed time, which means they sleep through the night in the crate (for the most part). Rootbeer is still too young to go potty outside, but he's almost fully mastered the pee pad!

Rootbeer is 2 months old and looks like a rottweiler and shepherd mix. He may be fully grown at about 50-70 lbs, and he is up to date on all age appropriate medical care and microchipped. This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is fill out an adoption application at www.muddypawsrescue.org. We will be in touch with you within 7 days of receiving your application!
Name: Rootbeer

Description:
Marty is 2 months old and looks like a Shepherd mix. He is likely to be 45-65 lbs fully grown, and is up to date on all age-appropriate medical care and microchipped.
This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is fill out an adoption application at www.muddypawsrescue.org. We will be in touch with you within 7 days of receiving your application!
Name: Marty

Description:
Tank is THE definition of a gentle giant. He is great with all humans and has been respectful and great with other dogs, regardless of their size! His current neighborhood bestie is a small frenchie. He is still coming out of his shell a bit but he is the biggest couch potato and love bug. He absolutely loves giving kisses and having his head in your lap. Sleeping and getting belly scratches are his number one priority. He will playfully paw at you if you stop giving him belly rubs before he is satisfied! He is a big boy that likes to go at his own (snail's) pace, so he needs to be with an owner that can be patient with him on walks - 120 lbs is a lot to carry around! Tank is even house trained and crate trained!

Tank is 4 years old and looks like a mastiff mix. He is fully grown at 119lbs, and he is up to date on all age appropriate medical care and microchipped.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is fill out an adoption application at www.muddypawsrescue.org. We will be in touch with you within 7 days of receiving your application!
Name: Tank

Description:
Foster update: Sid (aka Sid in the City) is adjusting well to the Big Apple! He loves exploring outside and being only 5lbs he is the perfect travel companion. Sid would do best with a patient family, as he likes to take long walks at a glacial pace and needs a little time to warm up to new people. Though we are still working on house training, Sid is an intelligent dog who was quick to learn sit, sit pretty, and dance! While inside Sid spends most his day asleep in his crate with the door open. He likes his personal space but also enjoys sniffing his foster brother and walking circles around the living room between snoozes.

Sid is 2 years old and looks like a Chihuahua mix. He is fully grown at 5lbs, and he is up to date on all age appropriate medical care and microchipped.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is fill out an adoption application at www.muddypawsrescue.org. We will be in touch with you within 7 days of receiving your application!
Name: Sid

Description:
Foster update: Hercules is an incredibly loving and gentle boy who wants you to pet him all day long. He is new to the city and still adjusting to its sights and sounds, but is showing great improvement and loves going on walks where he can sniff out every spot the city has to offer. He walks well on a transitional leash and has not shown signs of reactivity towards other dogs. He loves meeting new people and his tail will turn into a propeller as they pet and scratch him. Inside the apartment he likes to lay around the house all day long, and will return to his crate for naps. He is still adjusting to being left alone, but is doing great on his training and shown that he loves learning commands when given treats. Hercules is an amazing companion and has so much love to give to his adopters!

Hercules is 6 years old and looks like a Lab mix. He is fully grown at 67lbs, and he is up to date on all age appropriate medical care and microchipped.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is fill out an adoption application at www.muddypawsrescue.org. We will be in touch with you within 7 days of receiving your application!
Name: Hercules

Description:
Foster update: London is super loving and is a big sweetheart who is also quite timid. Loud noises do rattle her, but she reminds me of a country girl adjusting to the big city. At home, she is really well mannered. She is a very considerate house mate, you will rarely hear her make a noise except the sound of her tail wagging. She's great in the crate, totally house-trained, and an overall lovebug!

London is 6 years old and looks like a Jack Russell Terrier mix. She is fully grown at 19 lbs, and is up to date on all age-appropriate medical care and microchipped.

This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is fill out an adoption application at www.muddypawsrescue.org. We will be in touch with you within 7 days of receiving your application!
Name: London

Description:
Foster update: Bruce is a little snuggle bug! His favorite activity is laying on someone's lap. He loves to be pet and cuddled. At first he can be a little shy, but he warms up extremely quickly and is very sweet. Bruce loves treats and, though he is not fully housebroken, is learning to go to the bathroom outside. Bruce will growl at the dog in the mirror (aka his reflection), but nothing else so far. He is not too interested in toys yet, but he loves peanut butter. Bruce is a fast learner. He was nervous of the outside at first, but acclimated to walks within two days. He cries a little after being put into his crate at night, but settles down after about 15 minutes. He always prefers to be in the same room as his humans. Bruce is a happy dog and often looks like he's smiling!

Bruce is 6 months old and looks like a chihuahua mix. He may be fully grown at about 10lbs, and he is up to date on all age appropriate medical care and microchipped.
This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is fill out an adoption application at www.muddypawsrescue.org. We will be in touch with you within 7 days of receiving your application!
Name: Bruce

Description:
Foster update: Tyr is an older dog. He just likes to hang out, all day every day. He's the most low maintenance dog I've ever met. He has a couple health issues, mainly related to his weight and mobility. He doesn't have much of a neck so we've had to keep him in a harness, but the harness irritates him, so he needs to wear a T-shirt on walks (it's amazingly cute). His back legs are weak and he struggles to get up off the ground. He has a very tough time with stairs and would not be able to handle a walk up building (he can manage one flight of stairs maximum). He doesn't have the best dental situation so he can't really eat hard / dry foods. He doesn't have the strongest eyesight, so he's really hesitant to go down stairs.


Tyr is 9 years old and looks like a english bulldog mix. He is fully grown at 88lbs, and he is up to date on all age appropriate medical care and microchipped.
This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is fill out an adoption application at www.muddypawsrescue.org. We will be in touch with you within 7 days of receiving your application!
Name: Tyr

Description:
Foster update: Miss Harlie is a total sweetheart who will melt your heart like ice cream in the summer. This two-year old Catahoula Leopard Dog mix has a beautiful black & brown brindle coat, white paws, a polka dotted chest, striking mocha-colored eyes, a bold white streak down her face, and a charming gap in her front teeth just like Kate Moss. Harlie is a complete snuggle bug and loves nothing more than hanging on the couch all day, watching Netflix, and giving an absurd amount of affectionate kisses with her oversize tongue. She is massively loving, gentle, and sweet with all humans she meets. Harlie is intelligent, inquisitive, and loyal... and just wants to be around her owner all day. Harlie appears mostly housebroken but has had one accident as she gets used to her new home. Harlie loves catching some vitamin D, going on long walks, and is perfect on the leash - never pulling, and walking directly besides her owner. While she dabbles in chicken jerky, Miss Harlie's favorite treat in the world is peanut butter; she dreams of a world in which PB comes out of all the faucets. Harlie can't wait to find her furever home in which you both binge on that show you missed in the 90s whilst downing pupaccinos and snuggling for hours.

Harlie is 2 years old and looks like a catahoula mix. She is fully grown at 64lbs, and she is up to date on all age appropriate medical care and microchipped.
This dog is available for adoption through Muddy Paws Rescue. If you're interested in adopting, the first thing you should do is fill out an adoption application at www.muddypawsrescue.org. We will be in touch with you within 7 days of receiving your application!
Name: Harlie
